subject: Shipping taking to long to arrive
description_text:
Hi, I just ordered a Simsonn plus X pedals back in November and they
haven't arrived yet, and don't know anything about it just that they
arrived to Spain and that's it, so I just wanna know if you can tell me if
there's is anything wrong with it

Order #SSN3635

My tracking number: JSEKP2815941120YQ

Thanks you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Manro45GT,  The package of JSEKP2815941120YQ was returned to us. We reship it from our German warehouse this week.

Oh I see, then what do I do? My money is going to be refund? Or can I do
anything to get my pedals?

Oh I see, so if everything goes ok it will arrive soon?


El lun, 22 dic 2025 a las 13:13, service@simsonn.com (
Hi Manro45GT,    Yes, the goods have arrived at the warehouse today. We are currently arranging for them to be shelved and shipped via DHL Express. We will update you with the tracking number today.
